name: STO (Super Turning Object)
description:
REALLY LONG LORE:

STO is a game where you are a super turning object and you have to shoot at the red square. Why? Idk, I don't like red.

CONTROLS:

A-D: move the s.t.o;
W-S: move in the menu;
Space: shoot/select;
F12: fullscreen ON/OFF;

SOCIAL:
